A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The truth is...it’s just average. .. and we want SOOO much more from this iconic franchise. So when there’s an average movie when we’ve experienced epic\, it feels like an abomination. It makes light of its situation WAAAAYYY too much\, it’s not a comedy...if the originals would’ve done that\, they’d have been average too. I hate ep 1-3\, but at least they didn’t gag every minute..throw some 4th wall in\, and we’ve got space balls. ...It’s definitely not on par with today’s action standards. It needed to be heavier\, sharper\, and more challenging to the viewer. Are we concerned about 6 year olds understanding every detail bc they’re purchasing the merch?? Needed more weight\, like Wars and Empire had\, and fell utterly short. You end up caring about no one\, really.. Diversity is needed. It’s time... it’s way past time..but cmon- don’t put in characters to kill them off for the sake of a “status quo”..no one benefits..WRITE A GOOD SCREENPLAy...i will hesitate to see next movie until I see positive fan reviews.
